quotes.quote: People often say that beauty is in the eye of the beholder, and I say that the most liberating thing about beauty is realizing you are the beholder.
There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic.

Being pretty doesn't mean that I'm dumb. As well as being silent in a situation doesn't mean that I'm wise. Merely look at it my way; I'm pretty because of all the ugliness I've seen and dealt with and I'm silent in your wake because even an idiot knows when to bite their tongue!
Being pretty on the inside means you dont hit your brother and you eat all your peas thats what my grandma taught me.
It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.
Beauty is only skin deep, and the world is full of thin skinned people.
Looks are so deceptive that people should be done up like food packages with the ingredients clearly labeled.
Beauty is a mystery. You can neither eat it nor make flannel out of it.
You can be gorgeous at thirty, charming at forty, and irresistible for the rest of your life.
Beauty, to me, is about being comfortable in your own skin. That, or kick-ass red lipstick.
It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
There is nothing ugly; I never saw an ugly thing in my life: for let the form of an object be what it may, -- light, shade, and perspective will always make it beautiful.
A person is only beautiful, when their own beauty, is reflecting on to others.
[The lover says:] How beautiful you are, now that you love me.
Beauty can pierce one like a pain.
Beauty is a mystery. You can neither eat it nor make flannel out of it.
I think being beautiful is only one aspect of your life.
Think of all the beauty that's still left in and around you and be happy.
Beauty is the promise of happiness.
Behind every pretty little face & beautiful smile there is a girl that needs to be loved..!
A good face they say, is a letter of recommendation. O Nature, Nature, why art thou so dishonest, as ever to send men with these false recommendations into the World!
As a beauty I'm not a great star. Others are handsomer far; but my face -- I don't mind it because I'm behind it; it the folks out in front that I jar.
The faces that have charmed us the most escape us the soonest.
A pretty face is nothing of you have an ugly heart.
A pretty face gets old, a nice body will change, `
But I don't want some pretty face to tell me pretty lies. All I want is someone to believe
Not being beautiful was the true blessing. Not being beautiful forced me to develop my inner resources. The pretty girl has a handicap to overcome.
No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful.
Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
Judge nothing by the appearance. The more beautiful the serpent, the more fatal its sting.
It has been said that a pretty face is a passport. But it's not, it's a visa, and it runs out fast.
A pretty girl is like a melody that haunts you night and day.
What's the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you're so ugly on the inside?
Look at yourself in the mirror and don't be afraid to notice how beautiful you are.
Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
Beauty is only skin deep. I think what’s really important is finding a balance of mind, body, and spirit.
Adornment, what a science! Beauty, what a weapon! Modesty, what elegance!
Happiness and confidence are the prettiest things you can wear.
Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
The best color in the whole world is the one that looks good on you.
Being uncool is being pretty much the coolest you can be.

It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.
A real girl isn’t perfect, and a perfect girl isn’t real.
